songs.title: Dream On
songs.author: Aerosmith
songs.lyrics: Every time I look in the mirror, all these lines on my face getting clearer...

songs.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
songs.author: Queen
songs.lyrics: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?...

songs.title: Hotel California
songs.author: Eagles
songs.lyrics: On a dark desert highway, cool wind in my hair...
